 27 #include "config.h"
 28 #include "DOMCacheEngine.h"
 29 
 30 #include "CacheQueryOptions.h"
 31 #include "Exception.h"
 32 #include "HTTPParsers.h"
 33 #include "ScriptExecutionContext.h"
 34 
 35 namespace WebCore {
 36 
 37 namespace DOMCacheEngine {
 38 
 39 Exception convertToException(Error error)
 40 {
 41     switch (error) {
 42     case Error::NotImplemented:
 43         return Exception { NotSupportedError, "Not implemented"_s };
 44     case Error::ReadDisk:
 45         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed reading data from the file system"_s };
 46     case Error::WriteDisk:
 47         return Exception { TypeError, "Failed writing data to the file system"_s };
 48     case Error::QuotaExceeded:
 49         return Exception { QuotaExceededError, "Quota exceeded"_s };
 50     case Error::Internal:
 51         return Exception { TypeError, "Internal error"_s };
 52     case Error::Stopped:
 53         return Exception { TypeError, "Context is stopped"_s };

 54     }
 55     ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
 56     return Exception { TypeError, "Connection stopped"_s };
 57 }
 58 
 59 Exception convertToExceptionAndLog(ScriptExecutionContext* context, Error error)
 60 {
 61     auto exception = convertToException(error);
 62     if (context)
 63         context->addConsoleMessage(MessageSource::JS, MessageLevel::Error, makeString("Cache API operation failed: ", exception.message()));
 64     return exception;
 65 }
 66 
 67 static inline bool matchURLs(const ResourceRequest& request, const URL& cachedURL, const CacheQueryOptions& options)
 68 {
 69     ASSERT(options.ignoreMethod || request.httpMethod() == "GET");
 70 
 71     URL requestURL = request.url();
 72     URL cachedRequestURL = cachedURL;
 73 
 74     if (options.ignoreSearch) {
 75         if (requestURL.hasQuery())
 76             requestURL.setQuery({ });
 77         if (cachedRequestURL.hasQuery())
 78             cachedRequestURL.setQuery({ });
 79     }
 80     return equalIgnoringFragmentIdentifier(requestURL, cachedRequestURL);
 81 }
 82 
 83 bool queryCacheMatch(const ResourceRequest& request, const ResourceRequest& cachedRequest, const ResourceResponse& cachedResponse, const CacheQueryOptions& options)
 84 {
 85     if (!matchURLs(request, cachedRequest.url(), options))
 86         return false;
 87 
 88     if (options.ignoreVary)
 89         return true;
 90 
 91     String varyValue = cachedResponse.httpHeaderField(WebCore::HTTPHeaderName::Vary);
 92     if (varyValue.isNull())
 93         return true;
 94 
 95     bool isVarying = false;
 96     varyValue.split(',', [&](StringView view) {
 97         if (isVarying)
 98             return;
 99         auto nameView = stripLeadingAndTrailingHTTPSpaces(view);
100         if (nameView == "*") {
101             isVarying = true;
102             return;
103         }
104         auto name = nameView.toString();
105         isVarying = cachedRequest.httpHeaderField(name) != request.httpHeaderField(name);
106     });
107 
108     return !isVarying;
109 }
110 
111 bool queryCacheMatch(const ResourceRequest& request, const URL& url, bool hasVaryStar, const HashMap<String, String>& varyHeaders, const CacheQueryOptions& options)
112 {
113     if (!matchURLs(request, url, options))
114         return false;
115 
116     if (options.ignoreVary)
117         return true;
118 
119     if (hasVaryStar)
120         return false;
121 
122     for (const auto& pair : varyHeaders) {
123         if (pair.value != request.httpHeaderField(pair.key))
124             return false;
125     }
126     return true;
127 }
128 
129 ResponseBody isolatedResponseBody(const ResponseBody& body)
130 {
131     return WTF::switchOn(body, [](const Ref<FormData>& formData) {
132         return formData->isolatedCopy();
133     }, [](const Ref<SharedBuffer>& buffer) {
134         return buffer->copy();
135     }, [](const std::nullptr_t&) {
136         return DOMCacheEngine::ResponseBody { };
137     });
138 }
139 
140 ResponseBody copyResponseBody(const ResponseBody& body)
141 {
142     return WTF::switchOn(body, [](const Ref<FormData>& formData) {
143         return formData.copyRef();
144     }, [](const Ref<SharedBuffer>& buffer) {
145         return buffer.copyRef();
146     }, [](const std::nullptr_t&) {
147         return DOMCacheEngine::ResponseBody { };
148     });
149 }
150 
151 Record Record::copy() const
152 {
153     return Record { identifier, updateResponseCounter, requestHeadersGuard, request, options, referrer, responseHeadersGuard, response, copyResponseBody(responseBody), responseBodySize };
154 }
155 
156 static inline CacheInfo isolateCacheInfo(const CacheInfo& info)
157 {
158     return CacheInfo { info.identifier, info.name.isolatedCopy() };
159 }
160 
161 CacheInfos CacheInfos::isolatedCopy()
162 {
163     return { WTF::map(infos, isolateCacheInfo), updateCounter };
164 }
165 
166 } // namespace DOMCacheEngine
167 
168 } // namespace WebCore
